akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3211. Relationship to other authority Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to limit or affect any authority of the Secretary or the Commission under any other provision of law. (Pub. L. 95–617, title III, § 311, Nov. 9, 1978, 92 Stat. 3154.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries
Definitions The definitions of Secretary and Commission in section 2602 of Title 16, Conservation, apply to this section.
